features: VOMUMIZING SHAMPOO FOR FINE HAIR- builds 2.2 times more hair volume after using(Amore Pacific researcher's self-test result). Soybean picked in vinegar for 1-2 weeks contains higher amino aids than a general bean. It maximizes hair volume enhancement effect by containing fermented soybean picked in vinegar(Fermented chokong) which contains full of amino acids. In the case of applying fermented soybean pickled in vinegar on hair, it gives 2.2 times more volume at the roots
EFFECTIVELY PREVENTING HAIR LOSS - The black beans provide nutrition to the roots of the hair by improving blood circulation in the scalp, effectively preventing hair loss for men and women

NOURISHES YOUR SCALP AND STRENGTHEN HAIR - The houttuynia Cordata extract has been used as a medical and edible herb that improves blood circulation to promote hair growth. This herb helps to reduce scalp infection, flaking, and acne while revitalizing your scalp. Also known as fish mint, this herb has long been used as medical purposes on treating digestive issues, insect bites, fevers, coughs, etc. It nourishes your scalp and strengthens hair root for volume

BEAN PROTEIN BUILDS HEALTHY HAIR FOLLICLES – Zinc is found in beans and is essential for hair growth. Its plant-based protein builds healthy hair follicles and deficiency of zinc and protein may result in hair loss and weak hair structure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Volume, Light Smell of Herb, Control Oil Scalp
reviews.reviewText: Ryo’s Products are perfectly work well, my scalp easy get greasy and hard to get volume…but this product is game change

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It was a really great shampoo for the hair! But the smell was offsetting, overall it made my hair smooth and less tangled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with thin-thick Asian hair
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a reliable shampoo for my hair type. Drugstore shampoos don’t do much for my Asian hair, if I shower the night before, my hair usually gets oily by the late afternoon. It’s been a couple of days since I first used the shampoo (and some dry shampoo), and my hair isn’t the slightest bit oily. I totally recommend for my fellow Asian girls and anyone with straight and oily hair type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Smell of this shampoo might irritate someone. For me it was an okay smell. I noticed more hair loss than usual tho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo been using for years :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for quite sometime and it really does make my hair so smooth and shiny. Made my hair healthy looking and strong. Will definitely buy again and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Price is increasing
reviews.reviewText: Don't like they increase the price but quality is still good as before!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RYO is the best
reviews.reviewText: Once you use it you can never switch to another one. The scent and the feeling is so good
Works as intended. Seems to clean well. Not sure if it actually prevents hair loss but it certainly doesn't make it worse.

I have dry but easily get oily hair and also have problem with hair loss. I tried so many different shampoo but always come back to this shampoo. It keeps my hair bouncy and not greasy the next day. Also i noticed a great improvement on my hair loss! I love the herbal ginseng smell, some people might not like it. But to me the results is what matters!! I will stick to this shampoo for the rest of my lifee!!! And also W cosmetics sells the best price out there. I will continue to purchase from them.
It’s my 3rd bottle now and so far it’s been great. My hair looks shiny & healthy.Highly recommended for brittle hair

My favourite shampoo & conditioner, been using it for a year. Everyone compliments on how soft and shiny my hair has been ever since I started using it. My partner loves the smell it leaves in my hair too
